articles.title: Will Aaron Judge re-sign with Yankees in free agency? - MLB.com

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte
articles.title: 1 in 10 Americans over 65 have dementia, study finds - CNN
articles.description: Rates of dementia and mild cognitive decline rise every five years after 65, a new study found. African Americans were more likely to have dementia, and Hispanics were more likely to suffer from mild cognitive impairment.
articles.content: One in 10 Americans over 65 had dementia, while 22% experienced mild cognitive impairment, the earliest stage of the slow slide into senility, according to a new study conducted between 2016 and 2017… [+7123 chars]

articles.title: Auger-Aliassime wins European Open final for back-to-back ATP Tour titles - CBC Sports
articles.description: Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime won his second consecutive ATP tennis final after beating American Sebastian Korda 6-3, 6-4 in Sunday's final of the ATP 250 European Open in Antwerp, Belgium.
articles.content:
Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime has been on quite a roll of late.
The Montreal native defeated Sebastian Korda of the United States 6-3, 6-4 to claim his second consecutive ATP Tour title win at the … [+2112 chars]
